tool_description: This API confirms whether a submitted individual is listed as deceased and if deceased in which city and state they are so listed.
name: Death Master File Validation
title: Death Master File Validation

api_list.name: GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://death-master-file-validation.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "death-master-file-validation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
